title: Patent Patrol: More Shimano wireless shifting details
content:
You could spend a lot of snowy days by the fire reading Shimano patents. Heck, you could spend years. Get cozy, because Shimano recently added to the pile with more patents regarding its wireless shifting system. It’s a big question mark about when we’ll see Shimano’s wireless shifting system, or if we’ll see it at […]

The post Patent Patrol: More Shimano wireless shifting details appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
